sentences.en: After the dismissal of the cook we had to make our meals ourselves.
sentences.cn: 打发厨师走后我们只得自已做饭.

sentences.en: Demands for his dismissal have gathered momentum in recent weeks.
sentences.cn: 最近几周，要求将他解职的呼声越来越高。

sentences.en: Drunkenness at work was sufficient grounds for instant dismissal.
sentences.cn: 工作时醉酒足可导致立即被开除.

sentences.en: He looked blank when he was informed of his dismissal.
sentences.cn: 当被告知自己被解雇时,他显得茫然.

sentences.en: He recriminated against his employers for dismissal.
sentences.cn: 他反诉他的雇主开除他.

sentences.en: He sat there while I made the case for his dismissal.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿，听我陈述解雇他的理由。

sentences.en: He told the tribunal his career had "taken a nosedive" since his dismissal last year.
sentences.cn: 他告诉仲裁委员会，自去年被解雇以来，他的职业生涯就陷入了低谷。

sentences.en: He was blue over his dismissal.
sentences.cn: 他因被解雇而情绪低落.

sentences.en: His former chauffeur is claiming unfair dismissal on the grounds of racial discrimination.
sentences.cn: 他的前任司机声称自己因为种族歧视而遭到了不公平解雇。

sentences.en: No dismissals have been announced yet.
One of her employees sued her for wrongful dismissal.
sentences.cn: 有一名雇员起诉她非法解聘。

sentences.en: She decided to sue her employer for wrongful dismissal.
sentences.cn: 她决定起诉雇主非法解雇她。

sentences.en: She was awarded £5,000 in compensation for unfair dismissal.
sentences.cn: 她获判5,000英镑，作为遭到无理解雇的补偿。

sentences.en: The dispute was touched off by the dismissal of a workman for insubordination.
sentences.cn: 这次争端是由解雇一名不服从命令的工人引起的.

sentences.en: The servant accepted his dismissal without any complaint.
sentences.cn: 那仆人毫无怨言地接受解雇.

sentences.en: The woman claims she was the victim of constructive dismissal after being demoted.
sentences.cn: 这位女士称她被降职后被迫离职，属于推定解雇。

sentences.en: Wilson was claiming compensation for unfair dismissal .
sentences.cn: 威尔逊正在就无理解雇要求赔偿。

trans.tran_cn: 解雇，开除，不予考虑，不予理会
trans.tran_en: when someone is removed from their job
